metadata.title: CVE-2025-21176 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
.NET, .NET Framework, and Visual Studio Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2025-21176` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

aspnetcore-runtime-8.0 - 8.0.12-0ubuntu1~24.10.1
aspnetcore-targeting-pack-8.0 - 8.0.12-0ubuntu1~24.10.1
dotnet-apphost-pack-8.0 - 8.0.12-0ubuntu1~24.10.1
dotnet-host-8.0 - 8.0.12-0ubuntu1~24.10.1
dotnet-hostfxr-8.0 - 8.0.12-0ubuntu1~24.10.1
dotnet-runtime-8.0 - 8.0.12-0ubuntu1~24.10.1
dotnet-targeting-pack-8.0 - 8.0.12-0ubuntu1~24.10.1
dotnet-sdk-8.0 - 8.0.112-0ubuntu1~24.10.1
dotnet-sdk-8.0-source-built-artifacts - 8.0.112-0ubuntu1~24.10.1
dotnet-templates-8.0 - 8.0.112-0ubuntu1~24.10.1
netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1-8.0 - 8.0.112-0ubuntu1~24.10.1
dotnet8 - 8.0.112-8.0.12-0ubuntu1~24.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dotnet8 package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.0.112-8.0.12-0ubuntu1~24.10.1').
